column5: Welcome to our lakeside cabin on Lake Buchanan in the beautiful Texas Hill Country where recreational and relaxing opportunities abound; We are three miles from the scenic trails and observatory at Canyon of the Eagles, six miles from world class mountain biking at Reveille Peak Ranch, and just down the road from the Vanishing Texas River Cruise. We have an on site boat ramp, and a loaner kayak is available. The wildflowers are blooming and we have the best sunsets in all of Texas, come visit!
column8: The Catfish Cabin on Lake Buchanan
